Kangmin

K-TIGERS ZERO until Jan 31, 2021

Introduction

Kangmin is a South Korean singer and taekwondo practitioner. He is a former member and the lead vocalist of the co-ed group K-TIGERS ZERO.
On September 19, 2019, Kangmin debuted as a member of the co-ed group K-TIGERS ZERO with the release of their mini album HuiRoAeRak. Unfortunately, he left the group sometime in January 2021, with his final participation in the group being their first digital single "Love".
